[[div id="u-intro"]]
+* 影片介绍

[[div_ class="intro-copy"]]
[[span]]疯[[/span]][[span]]狂[[/span]][[span]]的[[/span]][[span]]日[[/span]][[span]]子[[/span]][[span]]业[[/span]][[span]]已[[/span]][[span]]来[[/span]][[span]]临[[/span]][[span]]。[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div_ class="intro-title"]]
改编自SCP基金会
规模最大设定
“1998”
[[/div]]

@@@@
@@@@

1998年7月12日，
处于黑暗中，与异常战斗，将其封印，
使之远离大众目光的基金会的“帷幕”被揭开了。
近两千年来本应牢不可破的面纱一朝破碎。
异常与常态融合，大大改变了世界的影响状态。

@@@@
@@@@

基金会广为人知，超科学与魔法成了人类生活的一部分。
电视上开始出现亚人主持人，
期间插播的广告里，经营超常技术的企业们也大肆宣传自己的新品。

@@@@
@@@@

但另一方面，它带来的不全是好处。
那一天在波兰发生的事件仿佛起始的火花，
世界各地不断发生超常事件或者灾害。
新型的事故与疾病成为社会问题，每日见诸报端，
世界逐渐背离原本的样子。

@@@@
@@@@

然后，便是即将到来的2001年9月11日。

@@@@
@@@@

此为人类与新的世界相对峙、不断前行的故事的序章。
2023年4月31日，再一次将历史改变的瞬间刻印于心吧。
[[/div]]
[[div_ id="u-story"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-60-wyyc/%E3%83%9E%E3%83%B3%E3%83%8F%E3%83%83%E3%82%BF%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AF%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%82%B7%E3%82%B9%E3%80%80%E3%83%9D%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%83%BC.png link="http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/1998-911-hub"]]

[[div]]
+* 剧情梗概

1998年初夏，
长久以来存在的“帷幕”破碎，
“异常”变得广为人知。

故事发生在三年以后的2011年9月11日。
“Copper02，准备响应。请报告状况。”
三架飞机在空中飞舞。
“行进方向改变──不对，它们在加速。”
前所未有的灾祸瞬间发生。
“客机正在加速──往双子星大楼方向行进。”
几分钟内，曼哈顿岛便沦为名副其实的地狱。

@@ @@

作为常态维持机构的SCP基金会、全球超自然联盟
全力抗击此次恐袭。
然而，即使防卫工作便已忙得不可开交。
此次恐袭的主谋是自基金会叛离的组织

“混沌分裂者”

全超联为了保护全人类，
做出了抹去曼哈顿岛的决议。
而基金会试图在他们执行这一举措之前平息事态。
在他们为各自的目标努力的时候，
街道消失，建筑物裂开，恶魔们飞扬跋扈。

这是以当时世界最大人口聚集地的正中央为舞台，
讲述诸多超常组织和民众怀着不同的心思，
在困难中以同一目的为目标的故事。
他们眼中不曾流露放弃的神色，始终前行，
为实现自己的目标而竭尽全力。

基金会、全超联、教会、还有诸多组织……
全都卷入了这疯狂的事态。

再一次欣赏他们的英姿吧。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div id="u-chara"]]
+* 主要角色

[[div class="chara-item chara-right chara-scp"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-75-pgrx/%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AC%E3%83%95%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Alto Clef

基金会的问题儿童之一。
偶然处于恐袭现场的他，出于资历而出任了
曼哈顿救援团队第一队的队长。
似乎与GOC主席有某些密切联系。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-right chara-scp"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-76-6qmf/%E3%83%96%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%83%88%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Jack Bright

同样是基金会的问题儿童。
与Clef一同卷入恐袭事件，由于是现场权限
最高的人员而不情不愿地担任了报道工作临
时管理员，但是……
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-left chara-ci"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-77-rsd9/%E6%82%AA%E5%A4%A2%E5%A7%AB%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* “AKUMU公主”

混沌分裂者Teal特遣队所属的IV级现实扭曲
者，可生成纸杯蛋糕并随意改变其成分或破
坏之。
能力是制造纸杯蛋糕型炸弹，是个喜欢把敌
人轰杀致死的危险人物，但对混分来说是个
优秀的人员。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-left chara-ci"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-78-6idv/%E3%83%A4%E3%83%AB%E3%82%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AD%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Cassian Jaruzelski

混沌分裂者军需部门负责物资运输的Gamma
级人员。
为实施恐袭，向曼哈顿岛内运输了大量人员和
物资。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-right chara-goc"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-79-jr2s/%E3%83%81%E3%82%A7%E3%83%AC%E3%82%B9%E3%82%BF%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Celesta

全超联副主管，代替出席联合国大会的主管处理事务，
负责108议会。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-right chara-goc"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-80-4g0a/%E3%82%A6%E3%83%BC%E3%83%89%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Oud

阿富汗部门主管。年少有为，但性格怪癖。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-right chara-goc"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-81-7ojt/%E3%83%8E%E3%83%AA%E3%82%A8%E3%82%AC%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Noriega

GOC物理部门北美地区高级军官，有能但狡
诈，性格令人厌恶的阴谋家。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-left chara-cbg"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-82-smab/%E3%83%8D%E3%82%A4%E3%82%B5%E3%83%B3%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* 尼森·菲尔莫尔

破碎之神教会的“神父”。
在事件当中遇到了某位少年，并因此改变了诸
多人的命运。
但这其中也继承了某人的意志。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-right chara-cbg"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-83-pck5/%E3%82%B8%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC%E3%83%89%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Jude Kriyot

操纵雷电的少年，现实扭曲者。
机缘巧合之下卷入了杰斐逊·米勒教堂的战斗。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-right chara-bkq"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-84-nxuh/%E3%82%A2%E3%83%AA%E3%82%BD%E3%83%B3%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Alison Chao

携带一只奇特动物的少女。
在前来寻父的途中卷入恐袭，
为保护民众而奔走。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="chara-item chara-right chara-sig"]]
[[image https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-85-gsct/%E3%83%98%E3%82%AD%E3%82%B5%E3%80%80%E3%82%B9%E3%83%81%E3%83%AB.png]]
[[div_]]
++* Hexa

跟随Alison的小动物，外形近似雪貂。
可以理解人类的语言，强化其契约者的魔法。
但无人知晓其目的。
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[span class="music-category"]]主题曲[[/span]]

[[span class="music-title"]]《Pain》[[/span]]
[[span class="music-creator"]]Three Days Grace[[/span]]

[[span class="music-comment"]]考虑到整体气氛而选择了这首曲子，并没有什么歌词，因此适配性很高。西洋音乐很适合宏大的开场。[[/span]]

@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

[[span class="music-category"]]插入曲[[/span]]

[[span class="music-title"]]《Manhattan Crisis》[[/span]]
[[span class="music-creator"]]SOYA-001[[/span]]

[[span class="music-title"]]《Breakthrough for Future》[[/span]]
[[span class="music-creator"]]SOYA-001[[/span]]

[[span class="music-comment"]]作为主题曲很不错，在场景中出现的插入曲能够让观感能提升好几倍。
能够一边在脑内想象各种景色，一边观赏音画效果丰富的电影。
向制作了最棒的主题曲的SOYA-001表示感谢。[[/span]]

#header h1 a span,
#header h2,
#search-top-box-input,
#login-status #my-account,
#login-status a[href="https://www.wikidot.com/account/messages"] > strong,
#side-bar > hr,
#side-bar div.menu-item .sub-text,
#side-bar .side-block:not(.sns) div.menu-item img,
#side-bar .close-menu,
#page-title,
#breadcrumbs {
	display: none !important;
}

body {
	background: #eee;
	color: #333;
	font-family: serif;
	overflow: hidden auto;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar {
	border: none;
	height: 5px;
	width: 5px;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
	background: #12121239;
}
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
	background: #12121293;
}

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
input,
textarea {
	font-family: inherit;
}
p {
	line-height: inherit;
}
a {
	color: inherit;
}

#header {
	background: #00292f;
	color: #fff;
	display: -ms-grid;
	display: grid;
	height: 3rem;
	grid-template-areas: "top-bar search login-status";
	-ms-grid-columns: 1fr auto auto;
	grid-template-columns: 1fr auto auto;
	-ms-grid-rows: 3rem;
	grid-template-rows: 3rem;
	position: fixed;
	right: 0;
	top: 0;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 2;
}
#header h1 {
	height: 3rem;
	left: 3rem;
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	width: 3rem;
	z-index: 3;
}
#header h1 a {
	background-image: url("https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file:5722815-22-kg1l/basalt_logotype_darkmode.png");
	background-position: center;
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	background-size: 90%;
	height: 100%;
	width: 100%;
}
#search-top-box {
	-ms-grid-row: 1;
	-ms-grid-column: 2;
	grid-area: search;
	margin: .5rem 0 .5rem .5rem;
	position: static;
	width: auto;
}
#search-top-box-form input[type=submit],
#search-top-box-form input[type=submit]:hover,
#search-top-box-form input[type=submit]:focus {
	-webkit-mask-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20viewBox%3D%220%200%20512%20512%22%3E%3Cpath%20fill%3D%22%23ddd%22%20d%3D%22M505%20442.7L405.3%20343c-4.5-4.5-10.6-7-17-7H372c27.6-35.3%2044-79.7%2044-128C416%2093.1%20322.9%200%20208%200S0%2093.1%200%20208s93.1%20208%20208%20208c48.3%200%2092.7-16.4%20128-44v16.3c0%206.4%202.5%2012.5%207%2017l99.7%2099.7c9.4%209.4%2024.6%209.4%2033.9%200l28.3-28.3c9.4-9.4%209.4-24.6.1-34zM208%20336c-70.7%200-128-57.2-128-128%200-70.7%2057.2-128%20128-128%2070.7%200%20128%2057.2%20128%20128%200%2070.7-57.2%20128-128%20128z%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E");
	-webkit-mask-position: center;
	-webkit-mask-repeat: no-repeat;
	-webkit-mask-size: 1.5rem;
	background: #fff;
	cursor: pointer;
	font-size: 0;
	height: 2rem;
	margin: 0;
	width: 2rem;
}
#top-bar {
	-ms-grid-row: 1;
	-ms-grid-column: 1;
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: row-reverse;
	grid-area: top-bar;
	height: 3rem;
	justify-content: space-between;
	position: static;
}
#top-bar .top-bar {
	width: auto;
}
#top-bar .mobile-top-bar {
	display: flex;
	justify-content: space-between;
	max-width: unset;
	width: 100%;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul {
	align-items: center;
	display: flex;
	height: 100%;
	width: -webkit-max-content;
	width: -moz-max-content;
	width: max-content;
}
#top-bar .mobile-top-bar > ul {
	display: none;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li > a {
	padding: 0 .5rem 0 0;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li > ul {
	background: #00292fdd;
	display: -ms-grid;
	display: grid;
	-ms-grid-columns: 1fr 1fr;
	grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
	opacity: 0;
	pointer-events: none;
	transition: opacity .2s ease-in-out;
	visibility: visible;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li:hover > ul,
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li.sfhover > ul {
	opacity: 1;
	pointer-events: all;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li:last-of-type > a {
	padding: 0;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li:nth-of-type(n+4) > ul {
	right: 6rem;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li > ul > li {
	position: static;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li > ul > li > a {
	background: #00292f00;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	height: 100%;
	transition: background-color .2s ease-in-out;
	padding: .5rem;
	width: auto;
}
#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li > ul > li > a:hover {
	background: #ffffff11;
}
#top-bar .open-menu p {
	margin: 0;
}
#top-bar .open-menu a {
	display: block;
	font-size: 0;
	height: 1.75rem;
	margin: .625rem;
	width: 1.75rem;
}
#login-status {
	-ms-grid-row: 1;
	-ms-grid-column: 3;
	display: flex;
	font-size: 0;
	grid-area: login-status;
	margin: .5rem .5rem .5rem 0;
	position: static;
}
#login-status .printuser a {
	display: block;
}
#login-status .printuser img.small {
	background: none !important;
	border-radius: 1rem;
	height: 2rem;
	padding: 0;
	width: 2rem;
}
#login-status > a::before, 
#login-status > a:hover::before {
	color: #fff;
	display: block;
	font-family: "FontAwesome";
	font-size: 2rem;
	line-height: 1;
	height: 2rem;
	text-decoration: none;
	width: 2rem;
}
#login-status .login-status-create-account::before {
	content: "\f067";
}
#login-status .login-status-sign-in::before {
	content: "\f090";
}
#login-status #account-topbutton {
	display: block;
	padding: 0;
	text-align: center;
}
#login-status #account-topbutton::before {
	content: "\f013";
}
#login-status a[href="https://www.wikidot.com/account/messages"] + #account-topbutton::before {
content: "\f0f3";
}
#login-status #account-options {
font-size: 1rem;
top: 2.5rem;
}
[id*="header-extra-div-"] {
	display: none;
}

#side-bar,
#side-bar:target {
	background: #00292f;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	color: #fff;
	height: calc(100vh - 3rem);
	left: -100%;
	overflow: hidden auto;
	padding: 1rem;
	position: fixed;
	top: 3rem;
	transition: left 1s ease-in-out;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 2;
}
#side-bar:target {
	left: 0;
}
#side-bar .heading {
	padding: 0;
	margin: 1rem 0;
}
#side-bar .side-block {
	background: #aaa1 !important;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	overflow: hidden;
	padding: 1rem;
	transition: margin 1s ease-in-out;
	width: 100%;
}
#side-bar:not(:target) .side-block {
	margin: 1rem 0 1rem -100vw;
}
#side-bar:target .side-block {
	transition-delay: 1s;
	margin: 1rem 0;
}
#side-bar .side-block.sns {
	padding: 0;
}
#side-bar .side-block:not(.sns) div.menu-item,
#side-bar .collapsible-block > div {
	font-size: 0;
	margin: 0;
}
#side-bar .side-block:not(.sns) div.menu-item a,
#side-bar .side-block .collapsible-block-link {
	background: #aaa2;
	color: #fff;
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	font-size: 1rem;
	margin: .25rem .25rem 0;
	padding: .5rem;
}
#side-bar .side-block:not(.sns) div.menu-item a::after,
#side-bar .side-block .collapsible-block-link::after {
	background: #fff;
	content: "";
	display: block;
	height: 1px;
	transition: width 1s ease-in-out;
	width: 0;
}
#side-bar .side-block:not(.sns) div.menu-item a:hover,
#side-bar .side-block .collapsible-block-link:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
}
#side-bar .side-block:not(.sns) div.menu-item a:hover::after,
#side-bar .side-block .collapsible-block-link:hover::after {
	width: 100%;
}
#side-bar div.scpnet-interwiki-wrapper {
	transition: margin 1s ease-in-out;
}
#side-bar:not(:target) div.scpnet-interwiki-wrapper {
	margin: 0 0 0 -100vw;
}
#side-bar:target div.scpnet-interwiki-wrapper {
	transition-delay: 1s;
	margin: 0;
}
 
#main-content div.close-menu {
	display: flex;
	flex-direction: column;
	height: 1.75rem;
	justify-content: space-around;
	margin: .625rem;
	pointer-events: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 0rem;
	width: 1.75rem;
	z-index: 2;
}
#main-content div.close-menu iframe {
	height: 100%;
	opacity: 0;
	position: absolute;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 1;
}
#main-content div.close-menu::before,
#main-content div.close-menu span,
#main-content div.close-menu::after {
	background: #fff;
	content: "";
	display: block;
	height: 2px;
	opacity: 1;
	-webkit-transform: none;
	transform: none;
	transition: opacity .3s ease-in-out, -webkit-transform .3s ease-in-out;
	transition: transform .3s ease-in-out, opacity .3s ease-in-out;
	transition: transform .3s ease-in-out, opacity .3s ease-in-out, -webkit-transform .3s ease-in-out;
	width: 100%;
}

	font-size: .6rem;
	margin: 1rem 2rem;
	padding: 1rem 0;
	text-align: center;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

#main-content .page-tags {
	margin: 0;
	padding: .5rem 2rem 0;
}
#main-content .page-tags span {
	align-items: center;
	border: none;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	display: flex;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
	gap: .5rem;
	max-width: unset;
	padding: .5rem;
	width: 100%;
}
#main-content .page-tags span::before {
	content: "タグ";
	font-weight: 700;
	padding: 0 .5rem;
}
#main-content .page-tags a {
	background: #fff;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	color: #000;
	margin: 0;
	padding: .25rem;
}
#main-content .page-tags a:hover {
	background: #a91a23;
	border-color: #a91a23;
	color: #fff;
	text-decoration: none;
}
#main-content .page-tags a::before {
	content: "#";
}

#page-options-container {
	align-items: center;
	display: flex;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
	justify-content: space-between;
	padding: 0 2rem;
}
#page-info {
	font-size: .8rem;
	margin: 0;
	text-align: left;
}
.page-watch-options {
	font-size: .8rem;
}
.page-options-bottom {
	background: #fff;
	border: 1px solid #ccc;
	display: flex;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
	height: -webkit-fit-content;
	height: -moz-fit-content;
	height: fit-content;
	gap: .5rem 0;
	line-height: inherit;
	margin: .5rem 0 0;
	padding: 1rem;
	text-align: center;
	width: 100%;
}
.page-options-bottom + .page-options-bottom {
	border-top: none;
	margin: -.5rem 0 0;
	padding: 0 1rem 1rem;
}
.page-options-bottom > a {
	align-items: center;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
	box-sizing: border-box;
	color: #000;
	display: flex;
	flex-basis: 8rem;
	flex-grow: 1;
	justify-content: center;
	margin: 0;
	padding: .5rem;
	text-align: center;
	transition: border-color .2s ease-in-out, color .2s ease-in-out;
	white-space: nowrap;
}
.page-options-bottom > a:hover {
	border-bottom-color: #a91a23;
	color: #a91a23;
	text-decoration: none;
}
#action-area {
	box-sizing: border-box;
	padding: 0 2rem;
}

#footer {
	align-items: baseline;
	background: none;
	color: #333;
	display: flex !important;
	flex-direction: row;
	flex-wrap: wrap;
	font-size: .8rem;
	gap: .25rem;
	justify-content: center;
	margin: 1rem 0 0;
	padding: .5rem 2rem;
	text-align: center;
}
#footer a {
	color: inherit;
	white-space: nowrap;
}
#footer .options {
	text-align: center;
	padding: 0;
	width: auto;
}
#footer .options::after {
	content: "|";
	white-space: pre;
}

#license-area {
	color: inherit;
	font-size: .8rem;
	padding: .5rem 2rem;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 56.25rem) {
	#header h1  {
		width: 2.5rem;
	}
	#top-bar {
		display: flex;
	}
	#top-bar .top-bar {
		display: none;
	}
	#top-bar .mobile-top-bar > ul {
		display: flex;
		font-size: .8rem;
	}
	#top-bar [class*="top-bar"] > ul > li > ul {
		left: 0;
		width: 100%;
	}

	#page-content div.page-rate-widget-box {
		font-size: .7rem;
	}
	#page-content div.page-rate-widget-box > span {
		height: 1rem;
	}
	#page-content div.page-rate-widget-box > span > a {
		padding: 0 .3rem;
	}
	#page-content .page-rate-widget-box > .cancel > a {
		padding: 0 .3rem 0 .2rem;
	}
	#page-content .rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton {
		height: 1rem;
		width: 1.2rem;
	}
	#page-content .creditButton a {
		height: 1rem;
		padding: 0;
		width: 1rem;
	}

	.top-wrapper {
		-webkit-animation: poster-slide 20s linear infinite;
		animation: poster-slide 20s linear infinite;
		background-position: center;
		background-size: cover;
		position: relative;
	}
	.top-text {
		color: #fff;
		font-size: .7rem;
	}
	.top-poster {
		-webkit-animation: none;
		animation: none;
		background: none;
		left: 0;
		pointer-events: none;
		position: absolute;
		top: 0;
	}
	.top-poster a {
		pointer-events: all;
	}
	.top-copy > div:first-of-type {
		-webkit-animation: copy-before 20s linear infinite;
		animation: copy-before 20s linear infinite;
	}
	.top-copy > div:last-of-type {
		-webkit-animation: copy-after 20s linear infinite;
		animation: copy-after 20s linear infinite;
	}

	.song-wrapper {
		flex-direction: column;
		gap: 0;
	}
	.song-wrapper a {
		background-size: 4rem, cover;
		height: 4rem;
		width: 100%;
	}
	.song-wrapper iframe {
		background: #dbaead;
		border: 1px solid #fff;
		height: 1.25rem;
		padding: .25rem;
		width: 100%
	}
	.song-inner {
		flex-direction: column;
		gap: 0;
	}

	.main-wrapper {
		display: block;
	}
	.main-menu {
		box-shadow: none;
		height: calc(100vh - 3rem);
		font-size: 1.25rem;
		padding: 3rem 0;
		position: fixed;
		top: 3rem;
		transition: left 1s ease-in-out;
		width: 100%;
	}
	#side-bar:not(:target) ~ * #u-main-side:not(:target)  .main-menu {
		left: -100%;
	}
	#side-bar:target ~ * #u-main-side .main-menu,
	#side-bar ~ * #u-main-side:target .main-menu {
		left: 0;
	}
	.main-close {
		color: #000;
		font-family: "FontAwesome";
		font-size: 3rem;
		height: 3rem;
		line-height: 1;
		position: absolute;
		right: 0;
		top: 0;
		transition: -webkit-transform 1s ease-in-out;
		transition: transform 1s ease-in-out;
		transition: transform 1s ease-in-out, -webkit-transform 1s ease-in-out;
		width: 1rem;
	}
	.main-close:hover {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	#side-bar:not(:target) ~ * #u-main-side:not(:target) .main-close {
		-webkit-transform: rotate(-180deg);
		transform: rotate(-180deg);
	}
	#side-bar:target ~ * #u-main-side .main-close,
	#side-bar ~ * #u-main-side:target .main-close {
		-webkit-transform: none;
		transform: none;
	}
	.main-close::before {
		content: "\f0d9";
	}
	.main-close,
	.main-content > a {
		display: block;
	}
	.main-content::before {
		background-image: url("https://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7069044-87-7o8a/%E3%82%BF%E3%83%96%E5%86%85%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AD%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E8%83%8C%E6%99%AF%E3%80%801200%C3%972000%E3%80%8080.png");
		opacity: .8;
	}
	.main-content > div[id]:not(:target) {
		transition-delay: 1s;
	}
	#u-story {
		align-items: center;
		flex-direction: column;
		text-align: center;
	}
	.main-content > #u-story h1 {
		margin: 0 auto;
	}
	.chara-item {
		display: block;
		font-size: clamp(.75rem, .5rem + 1vw, 1rem);
		height: auto;
		max-width: 30rem !important;
		overflow: hidden;
		position: relative;
	}
	.chara-item > img {
		margin: 0;
		height: auto;
		position: relative;
		transition: margin .5s ease-in-out;
		z-index: 1;
	}
	.chara-item > img:hover {
		margin: 0 0 15rem;
	}
	.chara-item > div {
		height: 15rem;
		position: absolute;
		top: 0;
		transition: top .5s ease-in-out;
		width: 100%;
	}
	.chara-item > img:hover + div {
		top: calc(100% - 15rem);
	}
	.staff-article {
		display: -ms-grid;
		display: grid;
		gap: 0;
	}
	#u-staff:target .staff-article div:nth-of-type(2) p:nth-of-type(1) {
		transition-delay: 1.6s;
	}
	#u-staff:target .staff-article div:nth-of-type(2) p:nth-of-type(2) {
		transition-delay: 1.8s;
	}
	#u-staff:target .staff-proposer p:nth-of-type(1) {
		transition-delay: 2.8s;
	}
	#u-staff:target .staff-proposer p:nth-of-type(2) {
		transition-delay: 3.8s;
	}
	.staff-name {
		gap: 0;
		justify-content: space-evenly;
	}
	#u-staff:target .staff-portal p {
		transition-delay: 4.8s;
	}
	.main-planes {
		height: calc(100% - 6rem);
		top: 6rem;
	}
}
[[/module]]

<!DOCTYPE html
    PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "https://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">

    <meta http-equiv="Content-Style-Type" content="text/css" />
    <meta http-equiv="content-language" content="ja,jp-ja" />
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.2.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
    <script>
        /*!
         * jQuery JavaScript Library v3.2.1

         * https://sizzlejs.com/

         */
        //---------------------------
        //ProjectName: Credit Module
        //FunctionName: Back Module
        //CreatedBy C-take , sinazugawa
        //License MIT
        //---------------------------
        $(function () {
            var ua = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
            var bReload = true;
            if ((ua.indexOf("applewebkit") >= 0 || ua.indexOf("firefox") >= 0) && ua.indexOf("edge") == -1)
                bReload = false;

            $('.fader').on("click", closeCredit);
            function closeCredit() {
                if (bReload) {
                    history.go(-1);
                    parent.location.href = document.referrer.split('#')[0];
                } else {
                    history.go(-1);
                }

                $('.fader').off("click");
                setTimeout(function () {
                    $('.fader').on("click", closeCredit);
                }, 1200);
            }
        });
    </script>
    <style>
        body {
            margin: 0;
        }
        .fader {
            cursor: pointer;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            position: fixed;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class='fader'></div>
</body>
</html>
[[/code]]

[[code type="CSS"]]
#interwiki .side-block {
	background: #aaa1;
	border: none;
	border-radius: 0;

	font-family: serif;
	font-size: 1rem;
	padding: 1rem;
}

	color: inherit;
